articles.description: A Northern California ICU physician vlogged about her side effects with Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine to show that someone actively treating virus patients trusts the science behind the vaccine.
articles.content: With the COVID-19 vaccine in its second week of distribution, one critical care physician in California started a vlog to detail her side effects in an effort to elicit trust and diminish hesitation.… [+3995 chars]
